lyrics.stanza: From my heart comes a melody Of the One who gave His life for me. How can I turn away from Thee; Lord, I have seen Thy changeless love for me. Enjoyment so full! Life's reality! That's what You're to me: Lord, You have won my heart! Take my heart, take my whole life too; Lord, I can't help giving myself to You.

From the day that I first met You. How could I help falling in love with You? Emptiness turned life's pleasures blue; No earthly love ever could see me through. 'Till I turned one day Opened up my heart, Let Your love flow in And fill my deepest part. Now I know, Lord, You're one with me; And I can't help giving myself to Thee. Lord, I can't help giving myself to Thee.
